reg_info.act_under: Emergency Management and Civil Protection Act

content.content: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1.

content.content: 2. This Order applies with respect to residential premises in a health unit to which Ontario Regulation 11/21 (Stay-at-Home Order) made under the Act applies. O. Reg. 62/21, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 2. This Order applies with respect to residential premises in a health unit to which Ontario Regulation 11/21 (Stay-at-Home Order) made under the Act applies. O. Reg. 62/21, s. 1.

content.content: 3. In this Order, “health unit” means a health unit as defined in the Health Protection and Promotion Act. O. Reg. 62/21, s. 1. SCHEDULE 1   Evictions
content.raw_html:
3. In this Order,

“health unit” means a health unit as defined in the Health Protection and Promotion Act. O. Reg. 62/21, s. 1.

SCHEDULE 1
Evictions

content.section: No enforcement of evictions or writs of possession
content.content: 1. (1) No person shall attend at a residential premises for the purpose of enforcing any of the following: 1. An order evicting a tenant under the Residential Tenancies Act, 2006. 2. A writ of possession issued by the Superior Court of Justice removing a person from their place of residence. (2) Subsection (1) does not apply if, (a) in respect of an order described in paragraph 1 of subsection (1), the Landlord and Tenant Board requests that the sheriff expedite the enforcement of the order; or (b) in respect of a writ of possession described in paragraph 2 of subsection (1), a judge of the Superior Court of Justice orders that the sheriff expedite the enforcement of the writ.   Français
content.raw_html:
1. (1) No person shall attend at a residential premises for the purpose of enforcing any of the following:

1. An order evicting a tenant under the Residential Tenancies Act, 2006.

2. A writ of possession issued by the Superior Court of Justice removing a person from their place of residence.

(2) Subsection (1) does not apply if,

(a) in respect of an order described in paragraph 1 of subsection (1), the Landlord and Tenant Board requests that the sheriff expedite the enforcement of the order; or

(b) in respect of a writ of possession described in paragraph 2 of subsection (1), a judge of the Superior Court of Justice orders that the sheriff expedite the enforcement of the writ.

 

 

Français
